name: Legion of Super Heroes: Saturn Girl Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Saturn Girl, along with Lighting Lad and Cosmic Boy, were the founders of the Legion of Super Heroes.  What is Saturn Girl's real name?
questions.explanation:
Imra Ardeen.

	Alexz Johnson is an actress who appeared in the TV series 'Smallville' as Saturn Girl.  Kari Wahlgren is an actress who voiced the character of Saturn Girl in the WB cartoon series 'Legion of Super Heroes'.  Amy Jackson is an actress who has portrayed Saturn Girl on the TV-series 'Supergirl'.

Titan.

	Despite her name, she is actually from Titan.  Titan is the largest of Saturn's moons and the second largest moon in our solar system.

questions.text: Saturn Girl was elected as the second Legion leader and was subsequently re-elected after her first term.  Who did she succeed as Legion leader?
questions.explanation:
Cosmic Boy.

	Having a GIRL be leader was quite forward thinking for stories written in the 1950s!  In fact, Saturn Girl is the first female superhero to ever lead a super hero team in comic book history.

questions.text: What is Saturn Girl's super power?
questions.explanation:
Telepathy.

	All inhabitants of Saturn Girl's home world have telepathic abilities.  Saturn Girl's are considered tenth level, the highest of her race.

questions.text: Before the events that led to the formation of the Legion of Super Heroes, Saturn Girl was traveling to Earth to do what?
questions.correct: Begin training as a Science Police officer
questions.explanation:
Begin training as a Science Police officer.

	In the first reboot of Legion continuity, Saturn Girl had trained and graduated as a Science Police officer prior to the events that led to the formation of the Legion of Super Heroes.

questions.text: During the continuity known as the Threeboot Legion (2005-2009), Saturn Girl had a unique characteristic.  What was it?
questions.explanation:
She couldn't speak.

	Due to their unique power set, the inhabitants of Saturn Girl's home world no longer had vocal cords.

questions.text: On two occasions, Saturn Girl has talked the Legion into admitting a new member who does not demonstrate a power first.  Who were these two members?
questions.explanation:
Element Lad and Sensor Girl.

	Element Lad initially auditioned for membership as Mystery Lad.  Sensor Girl was actually former Legionnaire, Princess Projectra, with heightened powers.

questions.text: Two individuals from Saturn Girl's home world have been members of the Legion of Super Villains.  Who are they?
questions.explanation:
Saturn Queen and Esper Lass.

	In one Legion continuity, Saturn Queen eventually reforms and marries former Legionnaire Matter-Eater Lad!  Esper Lass was a rejected Legion applicant who turned to crime.

questions.text: Which fellow Legion member does Saturn Girl eventually marry?
questions.explanation:
Lightning Lad.

	Originally the couple was forced to resign their Legion membership due to Legion rules against married members.  This bylaw was later rescinded and both returned to full-time active duty until the birth of their first twins.

questions.text: In addition to her super power, Saturn Girl is duly noted as being one of the most intelligent Legion members.  She invented 'serum xy-4'.  What did this serum do?
questions.correct: It was an antidote to Mon-El's weakness to lead.
options: It would temporary make Durlans unable to change shape.
It was the formula used to power the Legion flight belts.
It coated the rods for the lightning ceremony to revive Lightning Lad.
questions.explanation:
It was an antidote to Mon-El's weakness to lead.

	This serum allowed Mon-El to finally be freed from the Phantom Zone where he had resided for 1000 years.
